title: some words from an assassin main thats been playing assassins for a decent amount of time
body:
i started playing league for the first time in season 5 in the patch where winter wonder ori was releasred i think. if you think u used to be a noob, u wont believe the way i used to play, basically my first few games after bots what id do was play ashe, be a noob in lane till lvl 6 then id go into  a bush and do nothing but stay there and try to kill steal snipe with my ult. everyone else got levels and farm and i dindt, and yet i wondered why i did no dmg. sfter i learned the basics i browsed throught the store for a main, and found akali instantly. i chose her not because of her kit her stats or anything i simply sae her portait and liked ninjas at the time. so i played a ninja. then for a long time i was on a spree of snowballing id just get my first kill, then go around the map oneshotting everyone 1v9inh eith my lead getting insane kdas every game, i was unbeatable i killed thier whole team one by one every game. after that i picked up talon, whos by main since lvl 25 i love him to death hes still my one trick now. what i used to do as talon was just stay in lane till 6 and roam everywhere. i didnt even pick a lane i just rtyped roamer in blind. as soon as i hit 6, i roamed around everwhere killing people and helping my team. those wer all unranked and pre 30 antics, im sorry i bored uw ith my league history but thee point is my latest and current play style is i just use my assassin of choice, oneshot the adc and wed always win cuz they have no chance of out damaging them if we have dps and they dont. thats how i win games thats how i always play, kill the adc with an asassin and then fight thier team and win

now im still a talon god if u check my op.gg w, but my issue as of now is i altough im good at talon hes the ONLY thing im good at. i need to learn new champs for situations talon isnt good, such as  uh a shyvana/fiora/vayne/vlad/peel support comp or anything like that. this was never a problem befopre as if i got fed (i always do) i could just e into thier team use all my abilites and hydra and boom thier all dead.im not saying this is a good thing, i intend to learn brand for tank busting mid as a fall back and a tank jg for other situations. however i do think riuot went a tad overboard on the rework. duskblade is allowed to exisat becasue assassins NEED it for burst. talon and zed would have a much harder time assainating people without it. kayn and shaco basically have no chance of assassinating without it, they have to resort to tank dps other wise the thing is, why make assassins burst slower and harder to pull off? while other champs burst faster. here are a few examples annie ult oneshots faster than talon or zed ever will. ive gotten killed in 2 saas by vayne qcrits fast than the time it takes for talons w to even reach the intial range before the return delay and SHES A DAMN ADC u know what else kills people faster than asassins? viegar pressing r and killing u with one ability at 65 percent hp doing 17k dmg much effort and delays. now assassins burst is as fast as mages like ori and brand, but without the utility. might as well play a fighter fiver like vi or fiora who can still kill the adc but has cc utility and much more

replies.body:
Thing is people and Riot need to get through their head that the whole purpose for an assassin is to assassinate(clue's in the name assholes) so when you nerf the fuck out of every assassin because adc mains refuse to ward, stay with their team, and play safe then what's the point of having an assassin role in the game anyway??

Like we get outdamaged by nearly everyone that isn't a support(and even those are hard to kill with the amount of shield items and buffs Riot showers them with).

Tanks can just slap us around til we're dead, a mage can cc us then burst us from range faster than we ever could do to him, and an adc can auto us twice for a free kill, so what's the point of us existing in the game when Riot takes away our purpose to exist?

People complained about how there was no counterplay to assassins when wards, positioning, and shit like GA existed but tell me what the fuck is the counterplay to an adc bursting you down with 2 autos? or a mage blowing you up with 1 click of a button, tell me what the counterplay is to a tank that cc's you for an eternity then kills you faster than you could flash away?
I hate how biased Riot is and wish they'd actually fix our role instead of us having to rely on item effects to deal(delayed) damage that's still weaker than anything an adc or mage can produce.

Rito needs to realize that their game is a strategy game, if you are farming bot alone as adc and an assassin gets behind you, you already got outplayed.
Adcs shouldnt be able to "outplay" equally or even less fed assassins in a 1v1, thats what they have broken support items and exhaust for xd
But honestly... until some point adc can't 1v1 an assassins unless they're overfed. And even in late, it depend how u take the fight : and as an assassin u decide how and when u take the fight

The point is, ADCs should not even pretend to have the chance to take down an assassin in 1v1 (aside from those outplay-oriented picks such as Lucian and Vayne), just like assassins do not even consider engaging on a tank.

If the outcome of assassin vs ADC 1v1 is uncertain, what chances would the assassin have in a team fight environment where he must survive ambient damage, reach the backline somehow and utimately face the support+ADC duo, with the buttload of CC and shielding?
